list_definition.definition: a flat piece or bar (of soap etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I bought a tablet of soap.

list_definition.definition: a piece of usually stone with a flat surface on which words are engraved etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They put up a marble tablet in memory of his father.

list_definition.definition: (also tablet computer) computing a small one-piece portable computer which the user operates by a touchscreen.
